d=1000000007
for _ in range(int(input())):

for _ in range(int(input())):
 a=[int(x) for x in input().split()]
 p=1
 d=0
 a.sort()
 mod=(10**9)+7
 for v in a:
  p=(p*(v-d))%mod
  d+=1
 print(p%mod)

T = int(input())
ans = []

m = 10**9 + 7

for _ in range(T):
 N = [int(i) for i in input().split()]

 N.sort()
 ans.append( ((N[0]%m)*((N[1]-1)%m)*((N[2]-2)%m))%m )

for i in ans:
 print(i)
